headline: Elon Musk's xAI To Simulate Software Giants Like Microsoft, Calling It 'Macrohard'
summary: Elon Musk has announced plans to simulate software companies such as Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) using artificial intelligence (AI). What Happened: Musk’s AI firm, xAI, is said to be creating an AI-only software company named “Macrohard.” Musk characterized the project as “very real”, implying that software companies like Microsoft, which do not produce physical hardware, could theoretically be entirely simulated using AI. Join @xAI and help build a purely AI software company called Macr
